gui

Class GameDialog<dialog>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GameDialog<dialog>
  • Type Parameters:
    dialog - the generic type

    public class GameDialog<dialog>
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: GameDialog

    Description: class which could be either a GameOver dialog or a Winner because it has a generic type.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Diana Sighinolfi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameDialog(dialog D)
      Constructor which takes a JDialog and instantiates a new game dialog by assigning it to the generic object defined before.
